get.summary: Returns the Borrower's details and statuses
get.description:
This endpoint doesn't need other authentication than the proper username and password, and can be used anonymously.
Note: Does not authenticate the Borrower to Koha!

parameters.name: uname
parameters.description: The Username the Borrower uses to authenticate

parameters.name: passwd
parameters.description: The Password the Borrower uses to authenticate

400.description: Password authentication failed using username or password

get.summary: Check if a borrower is allowed to access self-service resources
get.description:
This endpoint is intended to be used by barcode readers to quickly check for self-service permissions and availability. The self-service device is expected to authenticate using it's own credentials and it√§s own default library location.

See the description of response with status '200 OK' for expected access restrictions.

parameters.name: cardnumber
parameters.description: The barcode of the library card the Borrower uses to authenticate

parameters.name: branchcode
parameters.description: The branchcode of the library to check for permissions

501.description: Feature not configured properly. Notify the API maintainer.
